sentences.sContent: Durham had garnered three times as many votes as Carey.
sentences.sCn: 德拉姆获得的选票数是凯里的3倍。

sentences.sContent: He has garnered extensive support for his proposals.
sentences.sCn: 他为他的提议赢得了广泛的支持。

remMethod.val: “家纳” → 家里收纳下来 → 收藏

trans.tranOther: If someone has garnered something useful or valuable, they have gained it or collected it
